about: Hi, I am Pinda Fortuin an apiring full-stack developer web developer.I enjoy problem solving and i am passionate about creating captivate websites.
My interest for web development came from my love of turning ideas into functional websites.I am enjoying every minute of what I am doing and can not wait to reach greater heights of this journey.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have built projects using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript.

testimonials.quotes: Pinda is a very passionate person especially when it comes to web development, her adaptability and quick learning skills really inspires me and if a client had to hire her I believe she would deliver

Pinda is a creative, goal-getter, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes her work. She excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.
When I met Pinda, immediately it became apparent that she has a history with computers. In the short span of 3 days, she unknowingly took me to heights I never knew existed.

Pinda's innovative approach to tasks and a sharp focus on functionality are truly commendable. Her dedication and prowess as a web developer are unmistakable, and I am confident that she will excel in any path she pursues.

Pinda Fortuin is an extraordinary Fullstack developer whose technical prowess is matched only by her unwavering dedication to excellence. Her ability to seamlessly navigate complex coding challenges and deliver elegant solutions is truly commendable. Beyond his technical brilliance, Pinda's collaborative spirit and infectious enthusiasm makes her not just a valued colleague but also a cherished friend in the world of software development.
